Package icyllis.modernui.widget

Interface Checkable2

All Superinterfaces:
Checkable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CheckableImageButton, CheckBox, CompoundButton, MaterialCheckBox, MaterialRadioButton, RadioButton, Switch, SwitchButton, ToggleButton
public interface Checkable2 extends Checkable
A custom checkable interface extending Checkable to support callback and check group logic.
Since:
3.12
